title: Real Life Data Mining and Big Data: Seminar
eventShortDescription: ​During this 1-day seminar, you will learn to design, develop, and deploy data mining solutions using SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS). This course demonstrates design and development best practices as you build a fully working data mining solution.
eventDescription:
​During this 1-day seminar, you will learn to design, develop, and deploy data mining solutions using SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS). This course demonstrates design and development best practices as you build a fully working data mining solution.

This seminar covers two real world case studies. 1.- Moderation solution for media companies. 2.- A shopping basket suggestion solution to increase sales.

This seminar finishes with an introduction to big data with Microsoft Hadoop
description: ​During this 1-day seminar, you will learn to design, develop, and deploy data mining solutions using SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS). This course demonstrates design and development best practices as you build a fully working data mining solution.
